name: ASTROKILL
description: Focused on combat without compromising realism, ASTROKILL is a modern space shooter drawing inspiration from old-school games like TIE Fighter and Freespace 2. Players pilot fighters, gunships, interceptors, and medics (in 1st or 3rd person) from warring factions in ballistic dogfights.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.8 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 6800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3.2 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 460 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
